official_title: A bill to authorize the back side of United States paper money of the denomination of $1 to be printed by a method other than the intaglio process.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act, as amended, and other Federal law to authorize the back side of the one-dollar note to be printed by other than the intaglio process.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the back side of United States paper money of the denomination of $1 to be printed by a method other than the intaglio process.
